00066                         <select name="Locale" onchange="document.languageform.submit()">
00067                         <?php
00068                         foreach ($LOCALES as $Locale => $Conf) {
00069                             $Selected= ($_SESSION['Locale'] == $Locale) ? 'selected' : '';
00070                             if ($_SESSION['Locale'] !== 'en_EN') {
00071                                 $LocaleDisplayName= _($Conf['Name']).' ('.$Conf['Name'].')';
00072                             }

00074                                 $LocaleDisplayName= _($Conf['Name']);

00085             <tr>
00086                 <td colspan="2">
00087                     <div id="menu">
00088                         <ul id="tabs">
00089                         <?php
00090                         $ModuleDirectory= dirname($_SERVER['SCRIPT_FILENAME']).'/';
00091                         $ServerPath= dirname($_SERVER['PHP_SELF']).'/';
00092 
00093                         if (preg_match('|/pf/|', $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'])) {
00094                             $ServerPath= '';
00095                             if (basename(dirname($_SERVER['PHP_SELF'])) !== 'pf') {
00096                                 $ServerPath= '../../';
00097                             }
00098                             $ModuleDirectory= $PF_PATH;
00099                         }
00100 
00101                         $ModuleFiles[]= array();
00102                         $DirHandle= opendir($ModuleDirectory);
00103                         while (false !== ($FileName= readdir($DirHandle))) {
00104                             if (!is_dir($ModuleDirectory.$FileName)) {
00105                                 $ModuleFiles[]= $FileName;
00106                             }
00107                         }
00108                         closedir($DirHandle);
00109                         
00110                         $PageActivated= FALSE;
00111                         foreach ($CW_MODULES[basename($ModuleDirectory)] as $ModuleName => $ModuleConf) {
00112                             foreach (${$ModuleName} as $FileName => $SubMenuConf) {
00113                                 if (in_array($FileName, $ModuleFiles)) {
00114                                     if (in_array($_SESSION['USER'], $SubMenuConf['Perms'])) {
00115                                         $Class= '';
00116                                         if (basename($_SERVER['PHP_SELF']) == $FileName) {
00117                                             $Class= 'class="active"';
00118                                             $_SESSION[basename($ModuleDirectory)]['topmenu']= $FileName;
00119                                             $PageActivated= TRUE;
00120                                         }
00121                                         ?>
00122                                         <li <?php echo $Class ?>>
00123                                             <a href="<?php echo $ServerPath.$FileName ?>"><?php echo _($SubMenuConf['Name']) ?></a>
00124                                         </li>
00125                                         <?php
00126                                     }
00127                                 }
00128                             }
00129                         }
00130 
00131                         // Rest of the menu items are for pfw:
00132                         if ($ModuleDirectory == $PF_PATH) {
00133                             $inst_dir = dirname(__FILE__).'/pf';
00134                             
00135                             $ServerPath= ($ServerPath == '') ? 'web/' : '../';
00136                             $DirHandle= opendir("$inst_dir/web");
00137                             while (false !== ($DirName= readdir($DirHandle))) {
00138                                 if (!preg_match('/^\./', $DirName) && is_dir("$inst_dir/web/$DirName")
00139                                     && $DirName <> "stylesheet" && ($DirName <> "CVS")) {
00140                             
00141                                     foreach ($CW_MODULES[basename($ModuleDirectory)] as $ModuleName => $ModuleConf) {
00142                                         foreach (${$ModuleName} as $filename => $SubMenuConf) {
00143                                             if (in_array($_SESSION['USER'], $SubMenuConf['Perms'])) {
00144                                                 if ($DirName == $filename) {
00145                                                     $Class= '';
00146                                                     if (preg_match("/\/$DirName\//", $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'])) {
00147                                                         $Class= 'class="active"';
00148                                                         $active_tab = $DirName;
00149                                                         $_SESSION[basename($ModuleDirectory)]['topmenu']= 'web/'.$DirName.'/index.php';
00150                                                         $PageActivated= TRUE;
00151                                                     }
00152                                                     ?>
00153                                                     <li <?php echo $Class ?>>
00154                                                         <a href="<?php echo $ServerPath.$DirName.'/index.php' ?>"><?php echo _($SubMenuConf['Name']) ?></a>
00155                                                     </li>
00156                                                     <?php
00157                                                 }
00158                                             }
00159                                         }
00160                                     }
00161                                 }
00162                             }
00163                             closedir($DirHandle);
00164                         }
